documents.title: east midlands weather update : a warm evening
text: the warm weather is set to continue this evening with temperatures reaching 19c .
there will be some breeze and cloud , with possible spots of light rain , but it will generally stay dry .
author: Lucy Martin
BBC Weather

documents.title: county ins & outs 2017
text: county ins & outs 2017

documents.title: trio join relegated spireites
text: chesterfield have added three new players to their squad .

the spireites , who were relegated from league one last season , have added former peterborough defender jerome binnom-williams to their squad along with midfielder jordan sinnott - formerly of halifax town - and striker delial brewster , an ex-everton youth player .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: chesterfield complete triple signing
text: chesterfield complete triple signing

documents.title: ranieri officially takes charge of french side nantes
text: former foxes boss claudio ranieri has been officially confirmed as the new boss of french side nantes .
it 's the 65-year-old 's first job in management since being sacked by the foxes in february .
he 's joined the french outfit on a two-year deal .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: eight weeks of roadworks for derbyshire village
text: drivers in north wingfield are facing eight weeks of disruption from tuesday as work begins to replace water pipes running underneath the village .
severn trent is spending almost £ 250,000 on the project , which will see new pipes installed beneath white leas avenue , greenland close , wayside close , ashford avenue and beeley close .
the firm said it would do its best to minimise disruption .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man found guilty of murder and attempted murder
text: a man has been found guilty of murdering his partner in kirkby-in-ashfield and attempting to murder another man .
pawel lupa , 40 , of gleneagles drive , was convicted of the murder of aleksandra mrozik , 47 , and the attempted murder of wojcek bocek , 32 , on 16 july last year , nottinghamshire police said .
he will be sentenced at nottingham crown court tomorrow .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: leicester sign hull defender maguire
text: leicester sign hull defender maguire

documents.title: watch : east midlands musicians honoured as part of bbc music day
text: three east midlands musicians have been honoured with blue plaques as part of bbc music day 2017 .
this video tells you everything you need to know about kevin coyne , eric pinkett and constance shacklock .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: defender completes foxes switch
text: leicester city have confirmed defender harry maguire as their first signing of the summer .
the 24-year-old centre back joins from recently relegated hull city .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: great britain-shaped cloud spotted in the east midlands
text: a cloud looking like a map of great britain has been spotted in the east midlands .
it was snapped by huddersfield photographer golcar matt and submitted to the bbc weather watchers site .
weather presenter alina jenkins said it was a common cumulus cloud , which can often be seen forming shapes in the sky .
`` they 're formed by the sun heating the air at the surface , '' she said .
`` the air then rises and as it does it cools and condenses to create the 'cotton wool ' type clouds which often take on interesting shapes . ''
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: huddersfield bid for derby county 's ince 'rejected '
text: from sky sports ' midlands correspondent
sky sources : # htafc have had a £ 7.2m bid for tom ince rejected by # dcfc .

documents.title: nottinghamshire and derbyshire projects to benefit from £ 62.9 million of funding
text: nottingham 's broadmarsh bus station and car park and the sherwood forest visitor centre are among the projects that will benefit from a total of £ 62.9m of government funding .
the money - from the government 's local growth fund secured by the d2n2 local enterprise partnership - has been allocated to 17 projects across derbyshire and nottinghamshire .
nottingham castle has also been awarded £ 5m to make improvements .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: mowbray expects mahoney to join forest
text: mowbray expects mahoney to join forest

documents.title: high-security hospital 'under-staffed '
text: high-security hospital 'under-staffed '

documents.title: hot air balloon snaps capture beauty of peak district
text: these cracking photos were taken by bbc journalist sandish shoker during a hot air balloon ride in the peak district yesterday .
looks like she could n't have a better day for it .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: rampton hospital criticised by inspectors
text: a high security hospital in nottinghamshire has been rated as `` requiring improvement '' by the care quality commission .
leadership at rampton was described as `` inadequate '' and serious concerns have been raised about the safety of staff working alone at night .
the trust that runs the retford hospital insists improvements are being made and says it is `` disappointed '' with the rating .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: elderly pair hurt in newark wall crash
text: two people have been taken to hospital with serious injuries following a collision .
author: Nottingham Post

documents.title: influential bluesman gets plaque in derby city centre
text: here 's the newly-installed blue plaque in honour of revered derby blues musician kevin coyne .
it was unveiled this morning at the former derby art college in green lane where the influential singer studied .
members of coyne 's family were present to see the plaque put up - one of dozens installed across the country as part of bbc music day 2017 .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: gazza-inspired england euro '96 win was 21 years ago
text: wow it 's exactly 21 years since an england side featuring nottingham forest 's stuart pearce ( and steve stone on the bench ) overcame scotland at euro '96 with that memorable goal from paul gascoigne .
can you remember who scored the opener though ?
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: antiques roadshow : 'all items will be looked at '
text: if you 're undecided on whether to take your heirloom down to abbey pumping station for a valuation , there 's still plenty of time
doors are open # antiquesroadshow at abbey pumping station .
if you 're in the queue by 4.30pm you 'll be seen by our experts @ twitterid
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: woman killed in leicestershire crash named
text: police have named a 31-year-old woman who was killed in a car crash in leicestershire last week .
jospehine woodward , from ellistown , was a passenger in a volvo which collided with a vw eos at the junction of the a6 harborough road and langton road in west langton on 4 june .
the drivers of both cars have both been discharged from hospital after being treated for serious injuries .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: london fire : safety reviews to be carried out at nottingham flats
text: safety reviews are being carried out at high rise flats in nottingham following a massive fire at a london tower block that has so far claimed the lives of 17 people .

nottingham city homes - which runs three tower blocks in the city , including manvers court in sneinton ( below ) - said fire alarms are tested weekly and that it has a `` robust response process '' in place for emergencies .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: grant signs new three-year forest deal
text: grant signs new three-year forest deal

documents.title: derby north mp tweaks commons oath
text: chris williamson was sworn in at the house of commons this morning .
he deviated from the script a little
has he thanked the # greenparty publically yet for standing down for him ?
gave him his healthy majority .
yes , he did thank us .
it was one of the first things he said in his victory speech .
excellent .
because at last election he disgraced himself .
did not have backbone to be gracious in defeat , however humiliating/disappointing
very unlike him wanting to be the centre of attention ! !
send him to the tower immediately
skeletor has entered the building !
not to be trusted .
one of the banwait boys
we are doomed the man 's a liability to # derby
i think that 's fair enough !
good for him
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: london fire : derbyshire tenants given safety tips
text: firefighters have been handing out safety advice to residents at rivermead house - derbyshire 's only high rise block of flats - following the grenfell tower blaze in london .
the death toll from the tragedy has risen to 17 and police have warned it 's expected to increase further .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: wheeler and griffiths handed government roles in reshuffle
text: government reshuffle news
south derbyshire mp heather wheeler ( has been promoted to government whip - from assistant government whip - and burton 's andrew griffiths has retained his government whip role .
it means both will have the title lord commissioner of hm treasury .
author: Chris Doidge
BBC Radio Derby, political reporter

documents.title: draw to take place for rebranded league cup
text: only 24 hours to wait until the draw takes place for the first round of the carabao cup .
what 's that , i hear you ask ?
it 's the new name for the league cup - or the efl cup as it was called last season .
the first round draw is taking in place in bangkok - not entirely sure why - at 13:00 on friday and will feature burton albion , derby county , nottingham forest , notts county and mansfield town .
leicester city will join in round two alongside other premier league sides not involved in european football .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: facebook live : antiques roadshow at leicester
text: we are now live on facebook at the antiques roadshow in leicester .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: facebook : derby tennis player urged to 'ignore racists '
text: we 've had a few comments on facebook after young derby tennis star jay clarke opened up about racial abuse he 'd received online .
karen o'donnell wrote : `` sadly there are scummy people who have nothing better to do .
while the likes of edl , bf and bnp are allowed to move freely , this kind of thing will always happen . ''
carol gadsby offered this advice : `` ignore it if you can , it 's more their problem than yours , could be jealousy of course . ''
author: Facebook

documents.title: antiques roadshow filming gets under way
text: away from the parking issues , there are blue skies and plenty of people at abbey pumping station for today 's show .
the cameras are rolling and early items have included a couple of elderly cuddly toys and a collection of vintage shoes .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'parking full ' at antiques roadshow in leicester
text: looks like it 's pretty busy down at abbey pumping station
parking is full please use the park and ride or delay your visit until after 2pm @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid
@ twitterid
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: parish council trials security firm in village
text: a parish council has been trialing the use of a private security firm - after concerns had been raised about anti-social behaviour in a village and the perceived lack of a police presence there .
magpie security has been driving around car parks and secluded areas in lowdham to tackle the problem on behalf of lowdham parish council .
the council 's chairman , councillor jacqueline finn , said : `` there is a definite feeling that the police are not sufficiently interested in coming to the village .
`` as to how successful it is , they clearly have been persuading people not to use the car parks , that has definitely been more noticeable . ''
the patrols come after selston parish council considered similar proposals back in january .
paddy tipping , nottinghamshire 's police and crime commissioner , says crime is not a big problem in lowdham and thinks it is unlikely the experiment will continue .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man accused of manslaughter says he gave alleged victim first aid
text: an engineer who is accused of causing the death of a young dad with a `` single punch '' tried to administer first aid to his victim after knocking him unconscious , a court has been told .
author: Derby Telegraph

documents.title: foxes set to complete maguire signing
text: leicester city are expected to announce the signing of hull city defender harry maguire today .
radio leicester is reporting the fee for the defender has been agreed and the player 's medical has been completed .
the 29-year-old northern ireland captain is expected to cost the foxes in the region of £ 12m with about £ 5m worth of add-ons .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: crash leads to heavy delays on the m1
text: there are major delays on the m1 southbound between junction 26 and junction 23 following a crash earlier , highways england says .
this was the queue approaching junction 25 from the north a few minutes ago .
severe delays on the # m1 due to an earlier collision .
traffic was held while incident was dealt with .
all lanes are now open .
hi , is there still delays ?
best , m
good afternoon .
no , the delays have long since cleared .
have a safe journey .
great thank you - have you got a rough time that it cleared ?
i 'll put an update on the loughborough echo facebook page : ) cheers .
thanks for yr reply .
the incident was cleared at approximately 9:40am traffic conditions had returned to normal by 11.30am .
brill thank you : )
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: cricket : derbyshire welcomes new t20 coach
text: derbyshire 's new t20 blast coach has arrived - and john wright says it 's a privilege to be back .
the man who led mumbai indians to the 2013 ipl title has also coached new zealand , but got his big break right here in derby , playing 12 seasons at the county ground .
author: Owen Bradley
BBC Radio Derby Sport

documents.title: skull is fixed to dinosaur ahead of wollaton hall exhibition
text: a skull has been attached to one of the largest dinosaurs in the dinosaurs of china exhibition at wollaton hall in nottingham .
it will display 26 dinosaurs and fossils that arrived from china after a 50-day journey .
some fossils have never been displayed outside asia .
the collection will tell the story of how dinosaurs evolved into birds .
wollaton hall has been closed for about two weeks while organisers put together the exhibition .
it is expected to open on 1 july and run until 29 october .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: derby arena usage figures revealed
text: encouraging figures on the number of `` leisure sessions '' at derby arena .
financial figures still not great - £ 750k loss expected this year .
author: Chris Doidge
BBC Radio Derby, political reporter

documents.title: police in hinckley hot dog rescue
text: police rescued a distressed dog from a hot car in hinckley yesterday after the animal 's plight was brought to their attention by a member of the public .
the dog is fine now and its owner has been handed a warning ticket by the rspca .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man blasted girlfriend in face with bb gun
text: a cannabis user repeatedly fired bb gun pellets at close range into his girlfriend 's face , limbs and body , after trying to strangle and suffocate her , a court heard .
author: Leicester Mercury

documents.title: high spirits among antiques roadshow faithful
text: more larks from the antiques roadshow queue outside abbey pumping station
`` i 've got no strings to hold me down '' # funinthequeue # leicester @ twitterid doors open 9.30am
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: brexit wife swap show to feature nottinghamshire town councillor
text: a nottinghamshire town councillor will star in a one-off brexit special of wife swap .
the channel 4 reality show has n't been on our screens for some time , but there will be a one-hour special tonight starring kat boettge - a councillor in kimberley .
german-born kat will spend a week living with a ukip supporting family in canvey island in essex .
kat , who lives in strelley , was also a candidate for the green party in the nottingham east constituency in the general election .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: london fire : safety advice offered to derbyshire tower block residents
text: firefighters will be visiting derbyshire 's only high rise block of flats this morning to reassure residents in the wake of yesterday 's tragic events in london .
from 11:30 , people will be offered advice on what to do if fire breaks out at the 12-storey rivermead house in bath street , derby .
alex johnson , area manager for derbyshire fire and rescue service , said the building was inspected regularly and it fully complied with current fire safety regulations .
she added it was important residents made themselves aware of their building 's specific fire plan .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: nottingham trains will have fewer carriages
text: east midlands trains is warning passengers there will be fewer carriages on services between nottingham and liverpool lime street today due to `` essential maintenance '' work .
at least it is n't one of the hottest days of the year
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: pedestrians mowed down in van attack
text: pedestrians mowed down in van attack

documents.title: leicester 'road rage attacker ' still not found
text: a driver who was caught on camera assaulting another motorist has yet to be traced , police have said .
dashcam footage showed the man driving his bmw over the pavement to undertake and block a renault clio before reaching into the car 's window to attack the driver .
it happened in blackbird road in leicester on 31 may .
police have now appealed for the public 's help in identifying the man .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : antiques roadshow comes to leicester
text: an episode of perennial sunday favourite antiques roadshow is being filmed at abbey pumping station today .
queues have already started forming outside the corporation road venue ahead of gates opening at 09:30 .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : van driver mows down pedestrians in leicester
text: a video has been released showing a van driver deliberately mowing down a group of pedestrians walking along a pavement in leicester .
lugman aslam , 26 , of warren view , leicester , pleaded guilty to dangerous driving and attempting to commit grievous bodily harm with intent on 28 june last year .
sentencing aslam to five years in prison at leicester crown court , recorder justin wigoder said it was `` quite remarkable '' no-one had been seriously hurt or killed .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: pub takes foie gras off menu after 'bullying '
text: foie gras has been removed from the menu of a pub in derbyshire following a campaign by animal activists .
david and samantha mchattie , who run the bridge inn in calver , said protests and online opposition against their use of the food had amounted to `` bullying '' .
the production of foie gras - which is produced from livers of force-fed ducks or geese - is illegal in the uk , but it is still a legal ingredient .
mrs mchattie said : `` the emotional toll was just too much .
my sister has been abused , my mother , my 80-year-old father , and one of our customers has been called horrendous names and had photographs of her children posted on an animal activist website . ''
nottingham animal rights , one of the protest organisers , posted : `` after a long campaign with the pub activists have managed to get another establishment to see sense and remove the item .
`` we do not see this as a victory for us , but a victory for the poor defenceless animal involved . ''
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : updates from across the region
text: travel : updates from across the region
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: join us for today 's live coverage
text: good morning !
it looks set to be another warm and sunny day today .
gavin bevis and i will be writing the updates on today 's east midlands live page , bringing you all the latest news , sport , weather and travel .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live
